InitBlock.name: Next Project variables

DBMapItem.name: SQLServer70
DBMapItem.Value: select max(A.MCAL_PERIOD_NAME),max(A.MCAL_QTR_NAME),max(A.MCAL_YEAR_NAME) from ( select C.MCAL_PERIOD_NAME as MCAL_PERIOD_NAME,'' as MCAL_QTR_NAME,'' as MCAL_YEAR_NAME from VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_MCAL_PERIOD_D C where C.adjustment_period_flg = 'N' and C.W_CURRENT_MCAL_PERIOD_CODE = 'Next' and C.MCAL_CAL_WID=valueof(NQ_SESSION.MCAL_CAL_WID_PROJ) union all -- Query to get previous quarter select '' as MCAL_PERIOD_NAME,C.MCAL_PER_NAME_QTR as MCAL_QTR_NAME,'' as MCAL_YEAR_NAME from VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_MCAL_QTR_D C WHERE C.W_CURRENT_MCAL_QTR_CODE = 'Next' and C.MCAL_CAL_WID=valueof(NQ_SESSION.MCAL_CAL_WID_PROJ) union all -- Query to get previous year select '' as MCAL_PERIOD_NAME,'' as MCAL_QTR_NAME,C.MCAL_PER_NAME_YEAR as MCAL_YEAR_NAME from VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_MCAL_YEAR_D C WHERE C.W_CURRENT_MCAL_YEAR_CODE = 'Next' and C.MCAL_CAL_WID=valueof(NQ_SESSION.MCAL_CAL_WID_PROJ)) As A
